//*********************SHOPON(CODEHEAD)- UNIVERSITY OF ASIA PACIFIC *************************//
//*************************************UAP_BRAINBONE****************************************//
//************************************Header Files*****************************************//
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<deque>
#include<set>
#include<cctype>
#include<list>
using namespace std;
//************************************Macros*********************************************//
#define MAX 1000000
#define fmax(a,b) ((a>b)?a:b)
#define fmin(a,b) ((a<b)?a:b)
#define PI 3.1416
#define lp 20071027
#define pf printf
#define pb push_back
#define lld long long int
#define sc scanf
#define sc1(t) scanf("%d",&t)
#define sc2(a,b) scanf("%d%d",&a,&b)
#define make(a,d) memset(a,d,sizeof(a))
//***********************************main function from here****************************//

// Returns true if there is a subset of set[] with sun equal to given sum


 int main()
 {
 	int cases,res[1005];
 	char s[1005];
 	lld k;
 	sc1(cases);
 	while(cases--)
 	{
 	    int ar[1005]={0},str[1005]={0};
	    int i,pos=0,carry=0,end;
 		sc("%s",s);
 		int len=strlen(s);
 		for(i=0;i<len;i++)
        {
            str[len-i-1]=s[i]-'0';
        }

 		sc("%lld",&k);
 		while(k!=0)
 		{
 			ar[pos]=k%2;
			 pos++;
 			k=k/2;

 		}
 		if(pos<=len)
 		 end=len;
 		else
		 end=pos;
		 pos--;
 		for(i=0;i<end;i++)
 		{
		    int temp=0;
 			temp=ar[i]+str[i]+carry;
 			//cout<<temp<<ar[i]<<str[i]<<carry<<"\n";
 			if(temp==2)
 			 {
 			 	res[i]=0;
 			 	carry=1;
 			 }
 			 if(temp==3)
 			 {
 			 	res[i]=1;
 			 	carry=1;
 			 }
 			 if(temp==1 || temp==0)
 			 {
 			 	res[i]=temp;
 			 	carry=0;
 			 }
 			 pos--;
 		}
 		if(carry!=0)
 		{
 			res[i]=carry;
 			end++;
 		}

 		for(i=end-1;i>=0;i--)
 		 pf("%d",res[i]);

        pf("\n");
 	}
 	return 0;
 }
